definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
McMillan or MacMillan (name)/Harold Macmillan (1894-1986), UK conservative politician, prime minister 1957-1963
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4

definition: FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]

sentences.english: However, Massimo Ambronisi equalized in the 25th minute for Milan.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，安布罗西尼在25分钟为米兰扳平了比分。

sentences.english: It's all set up very nicely for the Milan derby next weekend ...
sentences.chinese: 这对于下个周末的米兰德比是个不错的兆头。

sentences.english: Against Milan it will be a direct encounter and even the match against Bate is important.
sentences.chinese: 对米兰将是一场遭遇战，对博里索夫的比赛也很关键。

sentences.english: Organised crime continues to be the perpetual scourge of Milanese civic life.
sentences.chinese: 有预谋的犯罪仍然是对米兰市民的永远的威胁。
1987年，多纳多尼从亚特兰大来到米兰。

sentences.english: Chelsea coach Carlo Ancelotti is ready to show his hand for Milan midfielder Clarence Seedorf.
sentences.chinese: 最新报道显示，切尔西正寻求签下米兰的西多夫。

sentences.english: Arrigoni: Against Milan A Great Result "The turnover is working well."
sentences.chinese: 对阵米兰这是一个伟大的结果“轮换制工作的不错。”

sentences.english: Milan showed compactness, risking very little in the second half.
sentences.chinese: 米兰表现的很简洁，在下半场没有制造什么威胁。

sentences.english: One of Milan's claims to fame is their fashion industry.
sentences.chinese: 米兰闻名于世的原因之一是它的时尚业。

sentences.english: The project involves creation of documents for the course and the class-room at the Milan headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 该项目涉及的课程和班级在米兰总部厅文件的创建。

sentences.english: Cissokho's entourage are also in Milan and they are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 西索霍的随行人员也一直米兰，他们对此忧心忡忡。

sentences.english: Massimo Moratti, the Italian club's president, confirmed yesterday that he would not.
sentences.chinese: 昨天国际米兰主席莫拉蒂确认他不会买马斯切拉诺。

sentences.english: Braida is at Milanello to show this.
sentences.chinese: 布拉达在米兰内洛表示了此意。

sentences.english: Without that goal the two Milanese teams would be tied.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有那粒进球，两支米兰球队将平分秋色。

sentences.english: Neither Milan nor Catania have any disqualified players.
sentences.chinese: 米兰和卡坦尼亚都没有停赛球员。

sentences.english: Miranda? She always does it quickly.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达？她做题一向都很快。

definition: FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system
